text: Mary Heaton was a gymnast from England. Mary competed in the women's artistic team all-around event at the 1936 Summer Olympics. She was born on February 24, 1911 and died on March 30, 1989.Mary Heaton == References == Category:1911 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Bradford Category:British gymnasts Category:Olympians for Great Britain
title: Mary Heaton
